trans-unit.source: Provides customized assembly binding for designers that are used to create [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: 提供自定义程序集绑定的设计器用于创建[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。

trans-unit.source: This feature is used only in developer mode for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: 仅在开发人员模式中使用此功能[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。

trans-unit.source: It enables designers to supply isolated binding contexts as required, during iterative development of assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 它使设计器的程序集的迭代开发过程中提供根据需要，独立的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext"></xref> class, specifying the set of paths to search for third-party [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] types and for managed assemblies, and specifying the name of the context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext"></xref>类，指定用于搜索第三方路径集[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)]类型和托管程序集，并指定上下文的名称。

trans-unit.source: The paths to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的路径。

trans-unit.source: The name of the context.
trans-unit.target: 上下文的名称。

trans-unit.source: The current application domain is not the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 当前的应用程序域不是默认应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: -or- The process is not running in the app container.
trans-unit.target: -或者-进程未在应用程序容器中运行。

trans-unit.source: -or- The computer does not have a developer license.
trans-unit.target: -或者-计算机没有开发人员许可证。

trans-unit.source: name or paths is .
trans-unit.target: nameor paths is .

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified assembly from the current context.
trans-unit.target: 从当前上下文中加载指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The full name of the assembly to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的程序集的全名。

trans-unit.source: For a description of full assembly names, see the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的程序集名称的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: The assembly, if it is found in the current context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 程序集，则该文件位于当前上下文中; 如果否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified type from the current context.
trans-unit.target: 从当前上下文中加载指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The assembly-qualified name of the type to load.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: For a description of assembly-qualified names, see the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 程序集限定名称的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: The type, if it is found in the current context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前上下文中; 中找到了类型，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a context and sets it as the shared context.
trans-unit.target: 创建环境，并将其设置为共享的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The shared context cannot be set more than once.
trans-unit.target: 共享的上下文不能多次设置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext> is supported only in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext>仅在默认应用程序域中的受支持。</xref:System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of paths that are used to resolve binding requests that cannot be satisfied by the iteration context.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析无法满足迭代上下文的绑定请求的路径的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: The shared context has already been set in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 已在此应用程序域中设置的共享的上下文。

trans-unit.source: -or- The current application domain is not the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: -或者-当前的应用程序域不是默认应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: -or- The process is not running in the app container.
trans-unit.target: -或者-进程未在应用程序容器中运行。

trans-unit.source: -or- The computer does not have a developer license.
trans-unit.target: -或者-计算机没有开发人员许可证。

trans-unit.source: paths is .
trans-unit.target: pathsis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the designer binding context.
trans-unit.target: 获取设计器绑定上下文的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the context.
trans-unit.target: 上下文的名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets a context to handle iterations of assembly binding requests, as assemblies are recompiled during the design process.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于处理迭代的程序集绑定请求的上下文，如程序集将在设计过程重新编译。

trans-unit.source: The context can be replaced with a new binding context at any time, as required by the needs of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 在任何时候，所需的设计器的需求，上下文可以被替换为新的绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext> is supported only in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext>仅在默认应用程序域中的受支持。</xref:System.Runtime.DesignerServices.WindowsRuntimeDesignerContext>

trans-unit.source: The context that handles iterations of assembly binding requests.
trans-unit.target: 处理迭代的程序集绑定请求上下文。

trans-unit.source: The current application domain is not the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 当前的应用程序域不是默认应用程序域。

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .
